job_tasks.phrase: improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the tasks involved in writing code, identifying and fixing errors, and building new features, which are core software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
job_tasks.justification: This involves applying AI innovations to existing products, which falls under the broader umbrella of software development and enhancement.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct description of backend software development and deployment using specific technologies (serverless, cloud-native).

job_tasks.phrase: Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the act of improving and integrating AI solutions into existing software products and services, a clear software development task.
Code reviews are a standard practice in software development to ensure code quality and adherence to standards.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards
job_tasks.justification: Collaboration and adherence to standards are integral parts of the software development lifecycle.
While broad, this statement implies the application of development skills to create new and improved software solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: ensure best practices and high standards
improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on general software development tasks like coding, bug fixing, and back-end solutions. While it mentions 'AI tools' and 'AI-driven innovations', it lacks specific details on building, fine-tuning, or deploying generative models, RAG, or advanced prompt engineering, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile.
